titles.title: For the relief of Vince Munoz, Governor of the Tribal Council of the Ysleta del Sur Pueblo and all other enrolled members of the Ysleta del Sur Pueblo.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 9/5/1997--Introduced. Refers H.R. 2426 (for the relief of a named individual and enrolled members of a specified Indian tribe) to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for review.
